jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Monitor and Analyze all region related activities in alignment with Transport Marketing OKR. 
● Working closely with POI Partnership team to assist region and formulate partnership Strategy. 
● Working closely with offline and creative team for development and deployment of offline toolbox in region. 
● Prepare bi-weekly report for all region activity progress.
jobsJson.description:
● Monitor and Analyze all region related activities in alignment with Transport Marketing OKR.
● Working closely with POI Partnership team to assist region and formulate partnership Strategy.
● Working closely with offline and creative team for development and deployment of offline toolbox in region.
● Prepare bi-weekly report for all region activity progress.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Bachelor's Degree in Marketing Communication/Management or related major
  • 3 years experience in marketing or related fields (e.g. brand management, communications, creative agency)
  • Strong project management, analytical and planning skills
  • Highly organized, strong communicator and excellent problem solver
  • Wide connections with high quality vendors
